EmailTemplate.name: 202008_Americas_GDT_Sell-More_Sell-for-free_email.Internal Send
EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Trade wants to help you pay less fees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Are you still paying monthly subscription fees to list your inventory for sale? If you are, save your money and start using GoDirect Trade today.
We’ve taken the hassle and fees out of selling. Sellers can launch their storefront and load their first listings in less than five minutes:
- Click on Launch A Storefront below. - You will be guided to complete three easy steps (~5 minutes to complete). Your free 6-month subscription does not require a credit card. - Watch your customer base grow and the orders come in.
GoDirect Trade is the aerospace marketplace of the future. It has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor.”
Zero upfront costs to start selling online today. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/bWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
